pr_title: SAK-42371 Added DRAFT and RETURNED status to rubric evaluation

timeline.message:
SAK-42371 Added DRAFT and RETURNED status to rubric evaluation

https://jira.sakaiproject.org/browse/SAK-42371

Adding these stati means we can use the evaluation backend as the
cache for the evaluation as we switch between tools and their helpers.

+package org.sakaiproject.rubrics.logic.model;
+
+public enum EvaluationStatus {
+
+    NONE(0), DRAFT(1), RETURNED(2);
